titaness

		

	To give a taste of dry land to   
	those who approach the shores,   
	there is now found    
	the dream and rise of the ocean tides.  
		

	


	

		
summary

		

This is a module that can reliably
ascertain the health status of software.

(It's like a testing kit)
		

	


	

		
install

		
[xonsh] pip install titaness
		
	

	
	

		
documentation

		
[xonsh] titaness help 
		
	

	
	

		
The status checks of "titaness".

		

			#monitors
		

		
		
[xonsh] titaness internal-status 
		
		
		
These checks are run with pypi "body_scan"

		
"titaness" is a fork of "body_scan"

		
("body_scan" checks are written with "unittest")

	

	
	

		
Running "titaness" from a .py

		from .py
	

	
	

		
Running "titaness" from the shell

		shell dictionary
